entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tracadie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:45 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 12:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Flurries and rain showers beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 8:30 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
